attributes.action: Reduce Working tax credit age limit from 25 to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present the Working tax credit minimum age stands at 25 and not the school leaving age. This discrimination against a  sizable percentage of the working population meaning that people despite the fact they can be in exactly the same circumstances cant claim an allowance because they are too young.

I petition the prime minister to reduce the qualifying age to school leaving in order to support the public fairly and equally.
